text: Gu khaŋ muuŋgia ndu gangiap, gu khuen ndu nzuai. Gu ndu garim, ndu Fhe Bakɨme kha fhura ndɨɨi bigɨn, ndu ana gangiap guigira ana niihegap, fhura ana ndir zav mbui. Ndu mba ndɨkndɨga mbuim, mba ndɨkndɨk, ana kuga mbatɨga fara muuŋgiap, ndu ndava vhen kav ndun ndava vhee muuŋgim, ndu tɨvi mbatɨgi ga mbui bɨnan ki.”
